title: Redefining the Beauty Industry | Ann Krisha Buenaobra
description:
The beauty industry and societal standards of beauty affect every single one of us. If you could change those standards and change the beauty industry, would you? Ann Krisha Buenaobra joins us to talk all about it, from diversity on the runway and in fashion, finding true beauty in oneself, and the power of radical self-acceptance.

Ann Krisha Buenaobra is a model and content strategist. Ann Krisha is a writer, a beauty editor, and an inclusivity advocate.
